channel.title: Java/Compiler Help
channel.description:
Well I had to fix my Paths and stuff all up and now I can succesfully run a a server , but now my compiler wont work , it says
"The system cannot find the path specified" Press any key to continue...
I dont understand , because I can run servers just fine? Please help

item.title: Java/Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

Chassy13:

If you’ve set your environmental variables, edit the batch file for the compiler and change the JDK version to match the path for the version you set.

Read full topic

item.title: Java/Compiler Help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you’ve set your environmental variables, edit the batch file for the compiler and change the JDK version to match the path for the version you set.
